price: Enti (Nkͻmhyεni), wontumi mma awufoͻ nte asεm, na wontumi nso mma asosifoͻ nte frε no wͻ abrε a wͻadane wͻn akyi ama rekͻ.
arabic: فَإِنَّكَ لَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَلَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا وَلَّوۡاْ مُدۡبِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-innaka lā tus'miʿu al-mawtā walā tus'miʿu al-ṣuma al-duʿāa idhā wallaw mud'birīna
